Reviews.Title: I love this machine
Reviews.Author: Markellie Fogle
Reviews.Content: I am using my used HP Elitebook 8440p to complete this review. I have been using it consistently since receiving it and it first of all is in good condition. I have a HP Netbook I purchased new and have been using for two years now and it's a bit beat up. This HP Elitebook appears to have been hardly used. I am very happy with the performance and the condition of my HP Elitebook 8440p. I must inform you that my HP Netbook was pretty slow and it took a moderate amount of time to get work done, Not with the HP Elitebook 8440p, it's Fast. I am saving time and money with my HP Elitebook 8440p . I love it, I would reccommend anyone to buy it.

ProductInfo.Features:
Please note* - Laptop will have minor scratches / imperfections on the top LCD lid cover, palm rest, or keyboard area. This in no way will effect the functionality of the laptop.
Processor - Intel i5 2400 MHz || Memory Installed - 4096mb DDR3 > Upgradeable to 8192MB
Hard Drive - 250Gig Serial ATA || Optical Drive - DVD-RW || Screen Size - 14.0" WideScreen LCD
Software Installed - NEW Windows 7 Home Premium 32 Bit, word document & spreadsheet applications, shortcut to Microsofts Free virus protection along with a restore partition for easy reinstallation. All software is Genuine!!
What's in the Box? - HP EliteBook 8440p with NEW pre-installed software, power cord, software registration instructions and a 60 day Warranty
ProductInfo.Name: HP EliteBook 8440p Intel i5 2400 MHz 250Gig Serial ATA HDD 4096mb DDR3 DVD-RW Wireless WI-FI 14.0" WideScreen LCD Genuine Windows 7 Home Premium 32 Bit Laptop Notebook Computer
